views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11

Shield XI is a powerful app lockdown utility designed specifically for iOS 11. It was built around the idea of BioProtect X which is a paid and closed-source tweak. Don't get us wrong BioProtect X is amazing however we feel that since jailbreaks are becoming open source why shouldn't tweaks. This is why we will never charge for a Tweak and will always open source them. Shield XI is an always growing tweak with lots of features still to come. Including a Guest Mode, Custom Access Messages, Lock Toggles, lock in the app switcher and more! You can find the source code of Shield XI on

This tweak is ONLY COMPATIBLE with iOS 11.x.x

Configure options from Settings.

Version 1.0.1
Updated DEB file includes: 
• New and improved preference panes
• fixed a bug where users could just cancel the prompt and still open the app
• Intruder photo, takes a silent photo of the person trying to access your apps.
• Folder Lock - Lock all folders.

Still needing to be fixed:
• App Switcher Bypass
• Phone bypass
• Camera Bypass
• Basically all bypasses that were reported.
